About Me

I am a creative consultant looking to move into the exciting world of web development. Thanks to my many years involved in Improv, I find it easy to be a supportive team member, as well as activity listening to the needs of my clients and be able to easily adapt to the changing needs of the project. My goal is to continue to learn and grow so I can do more in creating innovated ways to tell their story.
